Hello, I'm Allison.

I am a Taiwanese-American East Coast transplant based out of Denver, Colorado.

I play as a rock climber, a dabbler in code, a wood-worker, and volunteer educator. I work as a radio frequency engineer.

Looking for collaboration? Please reach out! I am interested in community education, development, and discourse, data projects, and climate/greentech. I have a syllabus on Chinese/Taiwanese identity that Iâ€™m hoping particularly to develop further with some students.
